Package org.game.connect4

Class ConnectFourInitializer

java.lang.Object
org.game.connect4.ConnectFourInitializer
public class ConnectFourInitializer extends Object
ConnectFourInitializer provides different ways in which the ConnectFour game can be initialized. The initializers offer game creation based on game mode and default settings. This is not an exhaustive list of methods. Similar functionalities can be implemented in the client code.

      name2 - Name of the second player
